page.title: 02EDUCATION IN WOODLAND
page.content: There is one{Primary School}in Woodland with 21 children and two teachers,Mrs Howells and Mrs Kinghorn who is Head Teacher.Caretaker is Mrs Lowe and Clerk is Mrs Williamson. There are three classrooms.Room 3 is used for films,French and a library The hall is used for games,music and television. We have no{Nursery School}and no {Secondary School.}Our Secondary School is in Staindrop 8 miles away. On{Thursdays}we go to Bishop Auckland Swimming Baths.When we come back we do Maths and watch Animals in Action on television.Next we have dinner which is cooked on the premises by Mrs Anderson.After dinner we have play time with Miss Brunskill.Afternoon is Topic and Art. { 50 years ago}there was an old school with 111 children on the roll.
